recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti and mix with sauce.

recipes.title: Chicken Curry
recipes.ingredients: Chicken, Curry Powder, Coconut Milk, Onion, Garlic, Ginger
recipes.instructions: Saut√© onions, garlic, and ginger. Add chicken and cook until browned. Stir in curry powder and coconut milk. Simmer until chicken is fully cooked.

recipes.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.instructions: Butter the bread slices, place cheese between them, and grill until golden brown and the cheese is melted.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.ingredients: Romaine Lettuce, Croutons, Caesar Dressing, Parmesan Cheese, Chicken (optional)
recipes.instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing, add croutons and Parmesan cheese, and top with grilled chicken if desired.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.ingredients: Flour, Eggs, Milk, Baking Powder, Sugar, Butter
recipes.instructions: Mix flour, baking powder, and sugar. Add eggs and milk, and stir until smooth. Cook on a griddle until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden brown.
